title: Best Google Pixel Tablet fast chargers in 2025
description: Charge your Google Pixel Tablet quickly with these fast chargers. The post Best Google Pixel Tablet fast chargers in 2025 appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Charge your Google Pixel Tablet quickly with these fast chargers.
text: The Google Pixel Tablet is an Android tablet that doubles as a smart home display. It sports an 11-inch IPS LCD display with 1,600 x 2,560 pixels resolution. There is the Tensor G2 processor paired with 8GB of RAM. You get an 8MP camera on the rear as well as the front. The tablet is packed with a 7,020mAh battery. It is claimed to deliver up to 12 hours of video streaming. It supports 15W wired fast charging but Google does not ship the tablet with a charger. This is the reason you will need a compatible fast charger to take advantage of the fast charging speed. Check out these best Google Pixel Tablet fast chargers in 2025. Best Google Pixel Tablet cases Best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors Sale Google 30W USB-C Charger It is the official Google charger for Pixel devices. It has a single USB-C port that can deliver a peak power output of 30W. Compatible with other Google and USB-C devices as well. Motorola TurboPower 20W Charger This is an official Motorola charger with 20W charging speed. It is compatible with Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 standard. It has a single USB-A port but the best part is that it comes bundled with a 1-meter USB-A to USB-C cable. Sale Samsung 15W USB-C Charger This is a USB-C charger from Samsung where you get a single port. It will offer up to 15W charging speed and supports USB PD. It also comes bundled with a USB-C to USB-C cable. Available in Black and White colors. Anker PowerPort III 20W Charger (2-pack) This is a compact-sized wall charger with a peak charging speed of 20W. There are foldable prongs which makes it easier to carry around. There are various safety features to keep the temperature under check. UGREEN 20W USB-C Charger This wall charger comes with a single USB-C port. It can deliver up to 20W charging speed. It is compatible with PD 3.0, Quick Charge 4.0, PPS, and BC1.2 charging protocols. It is one the lightweight chargers you can get. Anker Ace 25W USB-C Charger This is a 25W charging speed wall charger from Anker. It has a single USB-C port with PPS tech support. It has foldable prongs and is about 23% smaller in size. Anker's PowerIQ 3.0 technology helps with optimized charging depending on the device. Sale Spigen 27W USB-C Charger This is a Spigen charger that can deliver up to 27W charging speed. It is also quite compact sized as it is claimed to be 35% smaller than a 20W charger. It is packed with 3D PCB and Quantum Boost technology that help boost the output performance. html:
The Google Pixel Tablet is an Android tablet that doubles as a smart home display. It sports an 11-inch IPS LCD display with 1,600 x 2,560 pixels resolution. There is the Tensor G2 processor paired with 8GB of RAM. You get an 8MP camera on the rear as well as the front.

The tablet is packed with a 7,020mAh battery. It is claimed to deliver up to 12 hours of video streaming. It supports 15W wired fast charging but Google does not ship the tablet with a charger. This is the reason you will need a compatible fast charger to take advantage of the fast charging speed.

Check out these best Google Pixel Tablet fast chargers in 2025.

  • Best Google Pixel Tablet cases
  • Best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors

Sale

Google 30W USB-C Charger

It is the official Google charger for Pixel devices. It has a single USB-C port that can deliver a peak power output of 30W. Compatible with other Google and USB-C devices as well.

Motorola TurboPower 20W Charger

This is an official Motorola charger with 20W charging speed. It is compatible with Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 standard. It has a single USB-A port but the best part is that it comes bundled with a 1-meter USB-A to USB-C cable.

Sale

Samsung 15W USB-C Charger

This is a USB-C charger from Samsung where you get a single port. It will offer up to 15W charging speed and supports USB PD. It also comes bundled with a USB-C to USB-C cable. Available in Black and White colors.

Anker PowerPort III 20W Charger (2-pack)

This is a compact-sized wall charger with a peak charging speed of 20W. There are foldable prongs which makes it easier to carry around. There are various safety features to keep the temperature under check.

UGREEN 20W USB-C Charger

This wall charger comes with a single USB-C port. It can deliver up to 20W charging speed. It is compatible with PD 3.0, Quick Charge 4.0, PPS, and BC1.2 charging protocols. It is one the lightweight chargers you can get.

Anker Ace 25W USB-C Charger

This is a 25W charging speed wall charger from Anker. It has a single USB-C port with PPS tech support. It has foldable prongs and is about 23% smaller in size. Anker's PowerIQ 3.0 technology helps with optimized charging depending on the device.

Sale

Spigen 27W USB-C Charger

This is a Spigen charger that can deliver up to 27W charging speed. It is also quite compact sized as it is claimed to be 35% smaller than a 20W charger. It is packed with 3D PCB and Quantum Boost technology that help boost the output performance.
